title: so, you win all games on night... lose all the next night... win all the next night... repeated
body: clearly there is a bug here. this isnt just a trend it has happened over and over and over for me. i win 4 /5 one night... lose 4/5 the next... win 4/5 next... this is annouying... clearly there is a bug here... either a mmr problem or this system is broke asf
